ruleset.name: Best Practices
ruleset.description: Rules which enforce generally accepted best practices.

rule.name: ClassStartNameEqualsEndName
rule.message: Class ends with an end clause with a different name
rule.description: Having a class starting with some name and some *different* name in its end clause is an error.

rule.name: ConnectUsingNonConnector
rule.message: Arguments passed to `connect` should be connectors, not `{0}`
rule.description: Modelica specification requires passing connectors to the `connect` clause, while some implementations tolerate using it on plain variables, etc..

rule.name: AmbiguousResolution
rule.description: There is multiple candidates for this type resolution. While generally this is not an error, this may indicate a bug.
